short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: High School DxD Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD High School DxD background. High School DxD background theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Switch up your High School DxD wallpaper every time you open a new tab.
2. Choose or favorite a High School DxD background in the wallpaper selector.
3. Google-powered search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your most visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding frequently accessed websites.
10. Quick links to Google apps.
11. Direct access to additional themes.
12. Simplified sharing to social networks.
13. One-click wallpaper downloading.
14. Fast access to gaming sites.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your High School DxD new tab.
